languages.text:
In space combat, the battlefield is separated into three zones marked by various degrees of brightness:
1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speeds even during combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. You can only end your {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} once your ship has traversed this minimum required distance upon entering the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text:
In space combat, the battlefield is separated into three zones marked by various degrees of brightness:
1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speed in space even in combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each round. You can only end your turn once your ship has traversed this required distance and entered the end movement zone.

1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speed in space even in combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each round. You can only end your turn once your ship has traversed this required distance and entered the end movement zone.

languages.text:
En el combate espacial, el campo de batalla se divide en tres zonas marcadas por diferentes niveles de brillo:
1. Zona de aceleración
2. Zona de movimiento medio
3. Zona de movimiento final
Las naves viajan a gran velocidad incluso durante el combate, por eso tanto tus naves como las de tus enemigos deben recorrer una cierta distancia cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Solo puedes terminar tu {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} cuando tu nave ha recorrido esta distancia mínima y entrado en la zona de movimiento final.

1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speeds even during combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. You can only end your {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} once your ship has traversed this minimum required distance upon entering the end movement zone.

languages.text:
宇宙での戦闘では、戦場はさまざまな明るさの3つのゾーンに分けられる：
1.加速ゾーン
2.普通速度ゾーン
3.移動終了ゾーン
船は戦闘中であっても高速で移動するため、あなたの船と敵の船の両方が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに一定の距離を移動する必要がある。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了できるのは、船が移動終了ゾーンに入る時点で、この最低限必要距離をすでに移動している場合に限る。
languages.original_text:
In space combat, the battlefield is separated into three zones marked by various degrees of brightness:
1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speeds even during combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. You can only end your {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} once your ship has traversed this minimum required distance upon entering the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text:
宇宙での戦闘では、戦場はさまざまな明るさの3つのゾーンに分けられる：
1.加速ゾーン
2.普通速度ゾーン
3.移動終了ゾーン
船は戦闘中であっても高速で移動するため、あなたの船と敵の船の両方が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに一定の距離を移動する必要がある。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了できるのは、船が移動終了ゾーンに入る時点で、この最低限必要距離をすでに移動している場合に限る。

languages.text:
在太空战中，战场会被划分为三个区域，以不同的亮度进行标记：
1.加速区域
2.移动区域
3.终点区域
您的虚空舰即便是在战斗期间，也处于高速飞行状态。正因如此，您的舰船与敌人的舰船每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都必须移动一定距离。只有当您的舰船进入终点区域，且在该区域内移动了规定的最短距离之后，您才能结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
languages.original_text:
In space combat, the battlefield is separated into three zones marked by various degrees of brightness:
1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speeds even during combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. You can only end your {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} once your ship has traversed this minimum required distance upon entering the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text:
在太空战中，战场会被划分为三个区域，以不同的亮度进行标记：
1、加速区域
2、移动区域
3、终点区域
您的虚空舰即便是在战斗期间，也处于高速飞行状态。正因如此，您的舰船与敌人的舰船每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都必须移动一定距离。只有当您的舰船进入终点区域，且在该区域内移动了规定的最短距离之后，您才能结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

languages.text:
Im Weltraumkampf wird das Schlachtfeld in drei Zonen unterteilt, die durch unterschiedliche Helligkeitsgrade gekennzeichnet sind:
1. Beschleunigungszone
2. Zone der mittleren Bewegung
3. Endbewegungszone
Schiffe bewegen sich auch im Kampf mit hoher Geschwindigkeit. Deshalb müssen sowohl deine Schiffe als auch die deiner Gegner jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eine bestimmte Distanz zurücklegen. Du kannst deinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erst beenden, wenn dein Schiff beim Betreten der Endbewegungszone diese erforderliche Mindestdistanz zurückgelegt hat.
languages.original_text:
In space combat, the battlefield is separated into three zones marked by various degrees of brightness:
1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speeds even during combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. You can only end your {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} once your ship has traversed this minimum required distance upon entering the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text:
Im Weltraumkampf wird das Schlachtfeld in drei Zonen unterteilt, die durch unterschiedliche Helligkeitsgrade gekennzeichnet sind:
1. Beschleunigungszone
2. Zone der mittleren Bewegung
3. Endbewegungszone
Schiffe bewegen sich auch im Kampf mit hoher Geschwindigkeit. Deshalb müssen sowohl deine Schiffe als auch die deiner Gegner jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eine bestimmte Distanz zurücklegen. Du kannst deine {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} erst beenden, wenn dein Schiff beim Betreten der Endbewegungszone diese erforderliche Mindestdistanz zurückgelegt hat.

languages.text:
Lors des combats spatiaux, le champ de bataille est divisé en trois zones distinguées par différents degrés de luminosité :
1. Zone d'accélération
2. Zone de déplacement intermédiaire
3. Zone de fin de déplacement
Les vaisseaux se déplacent à vive allure même pendant les combats. C'est la raison pour laquelle vos appareils et ceux de vos ennemis doivent se déplacer d'une certaine distance à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Pour mettre fin à votre {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, votre vaisseau doit avoir parcouru la distance minimale requise en pénétrant dans la zone de fin de déplacement.
languages.original_text:
In space combat, the battlefield is separated into three zones marked by various degrees of brightness:
1. Acceleration zone
2. Mid-movement zone
3. End movement zone
Ships travel at high speeds even during combat, which is why both your ships and those of your enemies must move a certain distance each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. You can only end your {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} once your ship has traversed this minimum required distance upon entering the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text:
Lors des combats spatiaux, le champ de bataille est divisé en trois zones marquées par différents degrés de luminosité :
1. Zone d'accélération
2. Zone de déplacement intermédiaire
3. Zone de fin de déplacement
Les vaisseaux se déplacent à vive allure même pendant les combats. C’est la raison pour laquelle vos vaisseaux et ceux de vos ennemis doivent se déplacer d'une certaine distance à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Pour mettre fin à votre {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, votre vaisseau doit avoir parcouru cette distance minimale requise en entrant dans la zone de fin de déplacement.
